reviewText: This is another great story in the great collection from torchlighters.
LOVE
The Torchlighters series is awesome!  All my kids like them, ages raging from 4-13 years old.
This is a great series of stories!
We love torchlighters!  Keep up the good work!
good
My kids love this
Nicely done video with story presented interestingly to children
Very uplifting and inspiration children films.
Before I bought this DVD I didn't know about John Wesley and his impact in christianity. It's a great episode!! Absolutely inspiring!!
Good movie.
Great story and it keeps the kids imagination.
True to Wesley's life story, accurate scripturallly and extremely well done. My 5&8 yr old grandkids really liked it...what more can I add?
The John Wesley Story is a good story for kids of all ages. Mine, aged 4 to 14, enjoyed it very much.
Great clean video.
my family has really enjoyed hearing some of these biographies through this format.  nicely done.
We love the Torchlighter series! Captivating true stories of inspirational Christian men and women for the whole family.
Real stories of faith !
Everyone of these are amazing!  They will challenge you, convict you and sometimes move you to tears!!

What an amazing way to teach children about what it is to walk with the Lord. All the Torchlighters series have been a wonderful way to encourage my whole family In their faith. It is really a blessing that each story starts when the main character as youngester and shows what following Jesus means. The John Wesley story shows the transformation that The Holy Spirt makes when he is saved.  trials will come but as he is walking with the Lord he is able to count it all joy.
Great!

All of the Torchlighters are awesome and character building. I always eagerly wait for the next. We have watched them many times, including my 12 yr old son. There are roughly a 30 minute cartoon and also a documentary for those interested. Any of them would make a wonderful gift.

These are very compelling historical dramas aimed at children.  The extras include a very nicely done documentary which is not animated.  My 10+ year old children enjoy both the animation and the documentary.
My kids loved the movie!!

Our family loves this story, especially our 4-year old daughter. It has inspired us to learn more about John Wesley. It also is a concise account of how John came to trust Jesus and spread the gospel. Contains concepts that both kids and adults can relate to.
Amazing story.
These are great movies!
love the torchlighters series
Deep truths for the entire family!
Great series that highlights classic heroes of the faith. My kids love these and so do my wife and I. Inspiring true stories every Christian should know.
Great, short stories of the lives of heroes of the Faith... my kids love them!
Very encouraging!!! My son enjoyed it as well.
Good short presentation for all ages.
WELL DONE!  HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
For me it was highly entertaining in an ironic kind of way.
very thankful to be able to watch this
Happy with purchase
Really good representation of the story.
Great Story
Awesome

The torchlighter series are an excellent way to give kids a glimpse at the lives of the heroes of the faith.  Some aspects seem to take a great deal of liberty, but they entertain and teach valuable lessons.
Great movie, we were able to enjoy it as a family from our 2 yr old to her 65 yr old grandmother :)

We have come to love and appreciate as a family the value of these stories of true heroes.  ALL of the Torch Lighter series teach about strength of character and highlight the cost of being a true disciple of Christ.  We want our children to learn from people who were transformed and later transformed their world. The cartoons and animation are not as sophisticated as Disney but the stories provide a wealth of faith that no Disney story can ever surpass.
Very well done!
My kids loved it
Great film.
Everything it was supposed to be
My kids love these -- ask to see them over and over.

So far, all of the Torchlighters series are awesome and encourage positive character building. We watch them not just learn more about the Christian faith, but also for historical benefits on how lives were impacted.....Wow!
Excellent quality
Family and friends love it

I love the Torchlighters series.  They keep the kids interested while teaching them about Christian history.  The biographies on them are also great for those who want to learn more about the person portrayed.
These DVD's are wonderful.  Our kids watch them over and over again. I enjoy them as well.  Very educational.
Another great torchlighters
Education delivered in a way that captivates my kids.
